name: Into the Madness
description:
My name is Lautaro (27 years old) and this is my third game made. This is part of the third practice of a short game programming study I'm doing.

This game is focused on interiors with a horror theme. I have used tutorials to support me in certain systems but I have also used a lot the knowledge that I have acquired so far. It was fun and exhausting doing it, but it was worth it.

Hope you can enjoy it.

Any comments, bugs, doubts or ideas are welcome.

Thank you.

Language: english.

Platform: PC.

Estimated playing time: 30 min - 1.30 hs.
